name: TodayLearnings
0:
”Alexa, open Today Learnings”
”Alexa, ask Today Learnings to tell me a fact from today i learned”
”what's new in today learnings”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: today learnings
des:
Today I Learned is one of the most followed subreddit on Reddit where users across many countries share many interesting and specific facts. It is being one of the most subscribed subreddit and the source to get authentic facts through its great user base and perfect moderations.

The facts cater across many fields like history, science, religion, countries, any many more. If you don't hear the fact properly, you can ask our skill to repeat again or simply move to the next fact by uttering next.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
